sentence: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is NMK. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 18 NMK. The top 15 wineries are members of the body Wines of Macedonia and they work together to represent the country s wines and wine regions in expert markets. The same body participates in creating wine law and appellations to improve the quality, together with the Ministry of Agriculture of North Macedonia.

entities.originalKey: Ministry of Agriculture of North Macedonia

sentence: The reference mountain chain of this VC is Mountain Meleshevija. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is unspecified. Maleshevski mountains are located in the eastern part of the Republic of North Macedonia. The are covers the municipalities of Berovo and Pehchevo, and is characterized with the natural and cultural wealth. Two rivers cross the region, Bregalnica and Strumica. Forests covers 52% of the Maleshevija region, while pastures around 20%.

The size of the area (km2) is 806. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 660. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 1932. The total population (in thousand) is 174.341. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 49.3. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) has been -3.00%. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 83.4. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been 1.20%.

The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 5056. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 769. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 9.80%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 45.60%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 44.53%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 5175. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 9332. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 9.75%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 27.70%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 62.50%.

The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 2088. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is unspecified. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 26003. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.

The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 16.20%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 30.50%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 53.30%.

The Vardar planning region has excellent climatic conditions for the development of agriculture and especially viticulture. Agricultural land covers an area of 145,699 ha (12 % of the total agricultural area in the Republic of North Macedonia), of which arable land is 70,006 ha and pastures 75,666 ha. In this region, there are about 45% of the total vineyards in the country. The winery represent a big development potential for the country and the national economy. There are 74 registered wineries across the country and all together produce over 90 million litters of wine annually. In general, Macedonian wineries are export-oriented (around 855 of production is exported), and it contributes to the image of the country. The local production of wine, is covering very well the domestic market, leaving a very small space for the imported wones.

The majority of winery yards and wineries are not in the region of Maleshevski mountain, though close to. The involvement and benefits from this Value Chain have not direct linkages with the population who are living in the region of Maleshevija (the reference region of the project). Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.
